CustomField.description: What is your project's focal point? For example, for projects focused on young people, will you address a specific risk factor in 11-14 year olds who are at risk of becoming NEET, or will you work with 16-24 year old NEETs at risk of becoming homeless?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the specific social issue that you are seeking to address to give people better life chances?
CustomField.label: SI - Specific Social Issue
